sentences.en: "Please don't yell at me." She began to sniffle.
sentences.cn: “请不要对我大喊大叫。”她啜泣起来。

sentences.en: Life is made up of sob, sniffle, and smile, with sniffle predominating.
sentences.cn: 人生是以哭 、 泣 、 笑三者构成的, 尤以泣为最.

sentences.en: Linda cry all day and sniffle audibly around the corner.
sentences.cn: 琳达在拐角处哭了一天并轻声地吸鼻涕.

sentences.en: She tried to sniff contemptuously, but succeeded in producing only a sniffle.
sentences.cn: 她想用鼻子轻蔑地哼上一声,可是不成, 只发出一声鼻音.
闻吸. 皱皱鼻子, 张开鼻孔.

sentences.en: The lack of air in the room makes everyone sniffle.
sentences.cn: 屋子里空气缺乏,使得每个人都频频吸气.

trans.tran_en: if you have the sniffles, you keep sniffing, especially because you have a cold
If you sniffle, you keep sniffing, usually because you are crying or have a cold
